source: UK SACN Reports (2011–2018), COMA reports, and Expert Group on Vitamins and Minerals (EVM)

ALL.note: SACN has not set specific water intake recommendations; general guidance aligns with EFSA (~2.0–2.5 L/day for adults).
SACN/COMA: No recommended intake or UL; advice is to keep intake as low as possible within a balanced diet.
